Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I'm new to this.... I'm 16wks post chemotherapy, I've only been growing hair for 10wks now.... Reading the previous post in dreading my hair coming back in fully..... At the main its like baby soft hair xx
Posts.Title: Does anyone have curly chemo hair ?

Posts.Content: Hi Crawford, I'm 2.5 years down the line.... It took me almost 2 weeks to get over the tiredness. I had 4 days in hospital as I reacted to the pain medication. The normally say it can take upto a month for the anesthetic to leAve ur system. Do you have a thermometer? Take your temp and see what it's like. If you are concerned then speak to ur Dr... There is no silly questions. All questions are gud... Never be afraid to share ur concerns...Â  xx
Posts.Title: Fatigue and Shivers

Posts.Content: Hi Jess, I wud ask for a 2nd opinion. If you are concerned bout it... xx
